title: 691. Bruce Feldman on Shifts in College Football & QBs to Watch Out For
itunes:title: 691. Bruce Feldman on Shifts in College Football & QBs to Watch Out For
description:
Bucky Brooks is back with a new episode of Move the Sticks. On this show, Bucky is joined by college football reporter and insider Bruce Feldman as he discusses the changes to the NCAA's NLI rules, the shift in college recruiting due to the impact of the transfer portal, the College Football Playoff potentially expanding to 12 teams, which college quarterbacks to watch out for and much more (:26).

Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
